TopicTitle: Can anyone help with getting a Logitech G27 to work in KSP

Articles.Content:
What problems are you having? Have you assigned axes and buttons to KSP commands in the settings?
When I got my joystick, I assumed KSP would just work with it, but you need to actually assign commands.
I'll assign axis to it, press accept, and then it will say Not Found.

Restart KSP with the controller plugged in, controller binding is not 100% reliable, but usually works after a restart.

Moving to Support.

If you are using steam you need to plug in your controller before you start steam.
I have found if I plug in a controller after steam has started most steam games will not recognize it.

[quote name='Korizan']If you are using steam you need to plug in your controller before you start steam.
I have found if I plug in a controller after steam has started most steam games will not recognize it.[/QUOTE]

That helped. Now, how to get a rocket car to work...
